text: Quick question, I just created a sandbox account, is there a way I can have an “index page” accessible through one of the provided system URLs?

I created a quick test page with a custom template and the URL is “<http://HubSpot-developers-xxxx-xxxxx.hs-sites.com/en/test>” but I’d like that index page to be accessible simply as “<http://HubSpot-developers-xxxx-xxxxx.hs-sites.com/>”
